main.name: Ben Szuchmacher
main.occupation: 💻 Software Engineer , 💼 Project Manager and the ✍️ Founder of BuntyJones Design Studio | 🍷 Wine Enthusiast|
main.description: Some languages I dabble in are: ReactJS, NodeJS, Python, SQL and MongoDB
main.bio: My name is Benjamin Szuchmacher. I am a dynamic and detail-oriented Software Engineer and Project Manager with a knack for conceptualizing and delivering elegant, user-friendly solutions effectively and efficiently. Armed with an extensive understanding of end-to-end SDLC and cloud computing, proficient in Front End and Back End technologies. I also possess more than 10 years of experience in directing service operations initiatives and in partner enablement. I demonstrate excellence in ensuring that the company's team members are well-orchestrated with their partner counterparts and leveraged around accounts and opportunities, by strategy and capabilities of each partner
main.contactmessage: If you have an awesome idea or project you need to get done, you need advice or just to chat and maybe meet for coffee...

education.description: Took Courses in Business, Law, Management and Computer Science

ITC's Computer FULL STACK/Data Science Bootcamp is a unique training course designed to transform hand-picked young professionals into qualified full-stack software developers. The program is a full time, 3.5 month, hands-on accelerator, which encourages research and self-led learning, as well as teamwork, all while incorporating industry's best practices. After the 3.5 months, the students are then placed in a two month internship where they can gain valuable experience and flourish in the market
1) Python Programming Essentials, 2) Responsive Website Basics: Code with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, 3) Ruby on Rails (An Introduction)

😀 JavaScript: The Hard Parts v2, 😁 Complete Intro to React--v5, 😂 Deep JavaScript Foundations--v3, 🤣 JavaScript: From Fundamentals to Functions JS--v2, 🙋‍♂ CSS Grids and Flexbox for Responsive Web Design, 👍 JavaScript: The New Hard Parts, 🤘🏼 Intermediate React --v2

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Welldone Software provides consulting, mentoring and software development services with the exceptional quality delivered by a handpicked team of experienced and innovative full-stack professionals who are passionate about their code.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: 🎥 EyeKnow automatically detects positive and negative caregiver-to-toddler behavior in kindergartens by processing video feeds from off-the-shelf CCTV cameras using AI and computer-vision algorithms. 🔎 Meaningful events are recorded and shared with kindergarten owners, law enforcement agencies, and government stakeholders, which results in a dramatic decrease in abuse incidents and a significant increase in caring quality.  ⚛️ Mainly used ReactJS, JavaScript, NodeJS, MongoDB, SQL, AWS, Docker and Python

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: 💼 Managed projects for the two startups we took on at the agency. (BuzzHunter is a SaSS company). 💬 Collaborated with team members and other testers overseas to develop, test, and support product features. 💻 Worked with Engineers and Data Scientists to develop interactive, user-friendly applications. 💼 Agile was how we approached the planning, development, testing and support. 💼

testimonials.text: Ben, working along side of you was such a pleasure. Your knowledge and dedication to your craft made my job easier as a Creative Director. It's amazing how smooth a project can go with you on board.

Hey Ben... Just got home and saw the final product. Unbelievable I can't believe that you did it out so quickly and professionally! I really really appreciate it, I'm so happy I got your referral. You saved me so much time and money, I want you to do all my sites.

After working closely with Ben I can say that the dedication and attention to details in his designs makes him a great Front end developer and UI/UX designer. Any company that will take him will greatly gain from his talent
Your website you created is incredible - put together in less than 2 days ((MIND BLOWN))
